name: 武器チェンジウェイト
ランダム発言＆増援タイマー

parameters: \I[245] Do you want to save the game?
リロード中でダメージ増加
ゲームオーバーの場合
//スタミナが致命傷による最大値を上回っている時
If, if I don't protect Senpai......\!
If you think I will hide away obediently,\|
then you made a huge mistake!
my body is rapidly losing strength.
I thought I had anticipated any situation...\!
but I didn't expect to be attacked with a kitchen knife!
The blood-soaked woman is slowly approaching,
and there's no chance to fight back.
...I was injured by my own bomb!
The teachers are approaching with security equipment.\!
I could no longer fight back.
I thought I had anticipated any situation...\!
but the police arrived at the scene so quickly!
The police officer is approaching with a handgun.\!
I thought I could anticipate whatever might happen...\!
but I didn't expect the principal to have a rifle!
The principal pointed his gun at me,\|
I ended my life as an insignificant murderer
I ended my life as an mass murderer
I couldn't live to witness everyone's suffering,\|
and ended my life in this school that I hated.
The police will be here soon,
I thought I could handle any situation.
...Just holding a gun makes me think I'am invincible.\!
And ignore the power these people unleashed when
Whenever there is a mass murder, \|
"I can do better than him, I can kill more than him."
I ended my life as an insignificant murderer
...No matter how many people I kill.\!
As long as I don't get caught,\|
People who should have died survived
With the regret that I could have killed more,\|
I ended my life as an ordinary mass murderer.

name: 集団悲鳴クールダウン

parameters: I'm sure they will desperately try to find the answer.\!
Why did such a tragedy happen today?\!
Why do I have to take so many lives?
However, no matter how they think about it.\!
Because no one wants to know.
…It is so today, and it will be so forever.
